price: Kwa yakini katika Yusuf na nduguze ziko ishara kwa wanao uliza.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ
footnotes: Hakika katika kisa cha Yusuf na nduguze zipo dalili na mazingatio kwa waulizao, wenye kutaka kujua.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
